prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (narcissistic Spanish assassin:1.2), intense piercing gaze, long blonde braided hair, sharp silver mask, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (visible skin imperfections:1.1), individual realistic hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching polished metal mask texture:1.3), (matching sharp claw texture:1.2), cinematic theatrical lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, messy hair, blurry, (no mask:1.4), plain face, plastic mask
